name: Snowhill Adventure
description:
Your main task in Snowhill Adventure is to escape from an avalanche and ski downhill to the finish. You, as the player, have the task of clearing the path so that the character can escape. Can you make it to the finish?

Controls: 

Mouse - use your primary mouse button to destroy stones, roll logs away or shoot rabbits  jumping over the hill (trees are only decorative, do not try to cut them:)
